newsitem.title: USA: FOCUS - NYMEX gasoline contract still seen hobbled.
newsitem.headline: FOCUS - NYMEX gasoline contract still seen hobbled.

text.p: Gasoline prices could soon begin a seasonal rally ahead of the summer driving season, but market participation in the NYMEX gasoline futures contract is not likely to soar along with prices, industry sources said.

In fact, no matter what steps the NYMEX takes to boost the popularity of its gasoline contract, the structure of the fuel industry may itself limit liquidity, said Philip Verleger, economist at Charles River Associates in Washington D.C.
